_header: Saint Luke says that a man dumb was
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 654.
_description: Gospel for the Third Sunday in Lent in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luke saise þat a man doumbe wasOf whaim criste chalid
                    oute sathanas…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor god þat his entente wele knawesEs full wele paied
                    of all his sawes
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc seiþ þat a Mon doumbe wasOf whom crist chased
                    Sathanas…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor God þat his entent knawesIs wel payed of his
                    sawes
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
…ffor if þou schewe vs token of þe heueneÞat
                    þou be goddes sonne wille we trowe euene…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ffor wele es him þat with techyngMan any soule til
                    heuene bryng

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt luke seyth þat a man doumb wasof whom crist chasid out
                    sathanas…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…for god þat his entente knawisis wel payde of his
                    sawis
CULDd11.Note:
Division between this and the following, 5159, occurs two lines later in this
                    MS.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke says þat a man dumbe wasOf whanne cryste chased
                    sathanas…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor god þat his entente knawesEs well payde of all his
                    sawes

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte luke says þat a man dum wasof wham cryste chasede oute
                    Sathanas…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…for gode þat his entent knawesEs wele payde of all hys
                    sawes
